players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead on the first night. Let's be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions and words during the day."
Bob: "I agree with Alice. Let's keep a close eye on each other and be cautious, especially since we've already lost one member."
You: "I think we should all share our movements and actions during the night, to help us identify any suspicious behavior."
Diana: "I will remain silent and observe everyone's actions. The mafioso is likely to be one of the remaining players, so I'll try to deduce who it might be based on their behavior."

Bob: "I believe it's important that we all share our movements and actions during the night to help us identify any suspicious behavior. This will also allow us to build trust and work together as a team."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
